name: Pirate x Pirate
description: "Pirate X Pirate is the First Custom-Dice Turn-Based Strategy Pirate Game in Blockchain. Recruit your crew, form your fleet, and test your prowess battling pirates and earning rewards with PXP's in-game token economy. Conquer the oceans and appropriate boundless treasures. As the team behind the biggest board game publisher in Thailand: 1. We are trusted among Thai Community; 2. We promise to bring the best gameplay experience with board game elements; 3. Easily accessible theme of the Pirate world; 4. Attracts external revenue stream from sponsors; 5. Attractive NFTs of Ships and Crew; 6. 3D graphics with dice battle system."
